author: CTPPS
body:
backport of #22915 
and also #23240

This PR backports the TOTEM timing detectors DQM features introduced in the `10_2_X` development branch. It consists in the backports of the following PRs:
* #22915: core developments of the DQM
* #23240: small fix + elastic/diagonal DQM developments

Based on #23352.
title: TOTEM Timing detectors: DQM backports for 10_1_X
